abstract: Dan Barry This Land column describes the annual battle between Terre Haute, Ind, residents and the thousands of crows that choose to winter in the city; city has organized a Crow Patrol that uses fireworks and flare guns to attempt to herd the crows away from more populated city neighborhoods.
snippet: Terre Haute, Ind., shares a problem with Auburn, N.Y., and Lancaster, Pa.: Crows. Lots and lots of crows.
lead_paragraph: Terre Haute, Ind., shares a problem with Auburn, N.Y., and Lancaster, Pa.: Crows. Lots and lots of crows.

headline.main: For This Menace, Only One Thing to Do: Ready, Aim, Fireworks!
headline.seo: Terre Haute Battles Crow Problem -This Land
headline.print_headline: For This Menace, Only One Thing to Do: Ready, Aim, Fireworks!
